name: Panzer (itch) (Marcos Engelhard)
description:
Originaly made to be played with an arduino controller that had joystciks. We adpted it to keyboard so that we could share the project. 

W - Go Forwards; 

S - Go Backwards;  

A and D - Rotate the tank;

Left and Right Arrow - Move camera;

Space- shoot projectiles;

The objective of the game is to destroy all the targets in order to escape the labyrinth. There are lights that guide you to the exit and show you where the targets are. This game was not meant to be challenging. Its purpose was to show our arduino controller as we can see on the youtibe video. 

Team:

Marcos Engelhard - Programmer;

Ricardo Oliveira - Level and Game Designer;

Simão Gonçalves - Programmer and Game Designer.

We used a free asset from the unity store, that brought an animated tank and mines. This was the asset: 

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/vehicles/land/cartoon-tank-free-165189
